page.title: 16GHELUVELT PARK
page.content:
{
Gheluvelt Park used to be called Barbourne Park but it changed in 1918 at the end of the first world war to Gheluvelt, a place in Belgium.Why Belgium? The Worcester regiment fought and many died. It is in Worcester on a main road .It has got{swings, slides, roundabouts}and lots more. There's a{paddling pool}to paddle in and lots of green grass to play on.You can have a game of {putting}or play tennis It has big gardens with lots of seats.It has a large{pond}with ducks and a brook. The pond has a{band stand}for music but it is not used very often now . You are not allowed to ride your bike because there is a new park keeper.A nice place to go to on summer afternoons.
